Rupee to follow Asian FX higher, RBI key factor in 2024The Indian rupee is expected to open marginally higher on Friday, tracking an uptick in Asian peers on bets of a Federal Reserve pivot as early as next quarter. Huawei forecasts 9% revenue growth in 2023 as smartphones surgeChinese tech giant Huawei Technologies (HWT.UL) expects to report revenue exceeding 700 billion yuan ($98.5 billion) for 2023, according to comments from rotating chairman Ken Hu in an internal new year message seen by Reuters. Former Hong Kong independence group leader seeks asylum in BritainTony Chung, who was sentenced in 2021 to prison under a national security law imposed by China, said he had fled to Britain and formally applied for political asylum. Former China central bank official jailed for 16 years for graft - CaixinA former Chinese central bank official has been sentenced to 16 years and six months in prison for taking bribes, leaking state secrets and insider trading as the ruling Communist Party tightens its grip on the financial sector. China's military lashes out at US after breakthrough talksChina's defence ministry lashed out at the United States on Thursday, a week after their top military officials resumed high-level talks, criticising its continued meddling in the Asia Pacific region and saying it maintained a "Cold War" mindset. Thu, 28 Dec 2023 10:50:14 GMT UJEWN6HLKFODRG32LXNKQXTRJU https://www.reuters.com/world/chinas-military-lashes-out-us-after-breakthrough-talks-2023-12-28/Laurie Chen世界
